sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEQUANI, a people anciently forming a part of Gallia Celtica, but annexed to Belgica by Auguſtus, ſeparated from the Helvetii by mount Jura, with the Rhine on the eaſt (Strabo), bordering on the Ædui, and Seguſtiano to the ſouth, and Lingones to the west (Tacitus). Now Franche Comte.
